config.script:
selectedColumn = self.props.selection.selectedColumn
	if selectedColumn == "participantId": 
		id = "PreviewParticipant" 
		participantId = self.props.selection.data[0].participantId
		params = {"participantID":participantId}
		if self.custom.DockID != participantId:
			system.perspective.openDock(id=id,params=params)
			payload = {"participantID":participantId}
			system.perspective.sendMessage("DockUpdate", payload=payload, scope = 'page' )
		else:
			system.perspective.toggleDock(id=id,params=params)
		self.custom.DockID = participantId
	else:
		row = self.props.data[event.row]
		selectedRow = {
		  "Task Type": row["Task Type"],
		  "assignerName": row["assignerName"],
		  "Task": row["Task"],
		  "notes": row["notes"],
		  "Participant Name": row["Participant Name"],
		  "completed":row["completed"],
		  "priority": row["priority"],
		  "Created": row["Created"],
		  "priorityId": row["priorityId"],
		  "participantId": row["participantId"],
		  "taskTypeId": row["taskTypeId"],
		  "statusId": row["statusId"],
		  "staffName": row["staffName"],
		  "id": row["id"],
		  "staffId": row["staffId"],
		  "Due Date": row["Due Date"]['value'],
		  "assignerId": row["assignerId"],
		  "status": row["status"]
		}
#		row['Due Date']=row['Due Date']['value']
#		system.perspective.print(selectedRow)
		self.view.params.selectedRowData  = selectedRow

transforms.code:
table_data = []
	loggedInUser = self.session.custom.loggedInStaffEmployeeID
	showAllTasks = value['showAllTasks']
	staffOnly = value['staffOnly']
	value = value['data']
	#Iterate over the results of the query
	for row in range(value.getRowCount()):
		row_data = {}
		style = {}
		style['classes'] = "Table/Cell_Dashboard"
		#Map query results into correct attributes
		row_data['id'] = value.getValueAt(row, "id")
		#row_data['options'] = ''
		row_data['Task Type'] = value.getValueAt(row, "type")
		row_data['Task'] = value.getValueAt(row, "title")
		row_data['Participant Name'] = value.getValueAt(row, "participantName")
		if value.getValueAt(row, "dueDate")>system.date.now():
			DateColor = '#0C4E8B'
		else:
			DateColor = '#FF7A59'
		row_data['Due Date'] = {'value':value.getValueAt(row, "dueDate"),'style':{'color':DateColor}}
		row_data['Created'] = system.date.format(value.getValueAt(row, "timeCreated"), "MM/dd/YYYY hh:mm a")
		row_data['notes'] = value.getValueAt(row, "notes")
		row_data['participantId'] = value.getValueAt(row, "participantId")
		row_data['taskTypeId'] = value.getValueAt(row, "taskTypeId")
		row_data['staffId'] = value.getValueAt(row, "staffId")
		row_data['statusId'] = value.getValueAt(row, "statusId")
		row_data['assignerId'] = value.getValueAt(row, "assignerId")
		row_data['priority'] = value.getValueAt(row, "taskPriority")
		row_data['priorityId'] = value.getValueAt(row, "priorityId")
		row_data['staffName'] = value.getValueAt(row, "staffName")
		row_data['assignerName'] = value.getValueAt(row, "assignerName")
		row_data['status'] = value.getValueAt(row, "Status")
		if value.getValueAt(row, "Completed") is None:
			row_data['completed'] = ''
		else:
			row_data['completed'] = value.getValueAt(row, "Completed")
		#Append the individual row date to the table data object if loggedInUser = staff/Assigner
#		system.perspective.print(loggedInUser)
#		system.perspective.print(value.getValueAt(row, "staffId"))
#		system.perspective.print(value.getValueAt(row, "assignerId"))
		
		# show all checkbox selected then show all records
		if showAllTasks == True:
			table_data.append(row_data)
		else:
			if staffOnly == True:
				if loggedInUser == value.getValueAt(row, "staffId"):
					table_data.append(row_data)
			else:
				if loggedInUser == value.getValueAt(row, "staffId") or loggedInUser == value.getValueAt(row, "assignerId"):
					table_data.append(row_data)
		
	return table_data
#	return value
return "#FFFFFF00" if value is None or value == -1 else "#9AF4EB4D"

	self.props.selection.selectedRow = -1
